definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
see 杳無音信|杳无音信[yao3 wu2 yin1 xin4]

pinyin: xiao1 xi5 ling2 tong1 ren2 shi4

sentences.english: She was thunderstruck to hear the news.
sentences.chinese: 得知消息时她大感惊讶。

sentences.english: The Console should indicate that both subscribers received a copy of the message.
sentences.chinese: 控制台应该指示两个订户均收到了该消息的复本。

sentences.english: We don't have any information from inside the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我们还没有任何来自核电站里面的消息，这是个问题。

sentences.english: It does not overwrite any cell-level information.
sentences.chinese: 它没有覆盖任何元级消息。

sentences.english: The news of her divorce gradually rippled outwards.
sentences.chinese: 她离婚的消息渐渐向外传开。

sentences.english: With the back end in place and ready to store messages, you need an announcer.
sentences.chinese: 后端就位并准备好存储消息后，您需要一个播音程序。

sentences.english: Hey fellas have you heard the news?
sentences.chinese: 嘿家伙你听到这个消息？

sentences.english: He itched to tell his friends the news.
sentences.chinese: 他急于要把这消息告诉他的朋友们。

sentences.english: Dantes listened to these melancholy tidings with outward calmness .
sentences.chinese: 丹特斯听取这些伤心的消息时外表很镇静。

sentences.english: Supported user-defined unread notification of automatical protection.
sentences.chinese: 支持用户自定义的新未读消息弹出提示。

sentences.english: You couldn't drag that information out of me.
sentences.chinese: 你休想从我这儿套出消息。

sentences.english: Jim Yong Kim says there is good news.
How can they control what pops up on the Internet?
sentences.chinese: 他们能否控制互联网上的弹出消息？

sentences.english: Evena railway map is close to classified information.
sentences.chinese: 即使是一张铁路图也近似于机密消息。

sentences.english: cold waters to a thirsty soul, so [is] good news from a far country.
sentences.chinese: 有好消息从远方来，就如拿凉水给口渴的人喝。

sentences.english: The paper published an extra to announce the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 那家报纸出版号外宣布战争结束的消息。

definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

pinyin: xiao1 xi5 ling2 tong1 ren2 shi4

definition: foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
